content: लोह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Red, reddish. {@--2@} Made of copper, coppery. {@--3@} Made of iron. --हः, --हं {@--1@} Copper. {@--2@} Iron. {@--3@} Steel. {@--4@} Any metal. {@--5@} Gold. {@--6@} Blood. {@--7@} A weapon; <ls>Ms. 9. 321.</ls> {@--8@} A fish-hook. --हः The red goat. --हं Aloe-wood.
